Reviews.Title: Wow - works as advertised!
Reviews.Author: Bolter
Reviews.Content: Only negative is no instructions.  I found a GREAT youtube how to video - it is the one in GERMAN; but just watch it - words are not necessary - the visuals are VERY GOOD and really show the nuances of what must be done to install correctly.  I am taking off one star due to no instructions - but again - it works - my camera isFIXED and GREAT PRICE!

Reviews.Title: Pefect
Reviews.Author: ANDRES VARGAS R.
Reviews.Content: Works great, is really easy to install, few screws, open... close.. and volia. Camera just like new. Ships in time. No problems.

Reviews.Title: Replacement LCD screen
Reviews.Author: William T. Laffond
Reviews.Content: I was thrilled to find that replacing my screen was all it took to get my camera back to full operation again. It had taken on some moisture, and the screen gradually failed, so it was unclear whether the circuitry or the screen was the problem.Opening and drying the camera body did not initially fix the problem.One disappointment with the product was the lack of any instructions on screen replacement, which was a little challenging for someone who doesn't do this regularly.

Reviews.Title: LCD
Reviews.Author: mike
Reviews.Content: lcd screen works great easy to install but there was no clear cover to protect the screen . Was there supposed to be one?

Reviews.Title: Real Easy Repair.
Reviews.Author: Dave H
Reviews.Content: This was a real easy repair of what otherwise would have been a junk camera.  Easy to replace original damaged display with this new one.  Small tools and small fingers got the camera back together in no time.
